metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13301 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In FFmpeg 4.0.1, due to a missing check of a profile value before settingit, the ff_mpeg4_decode_picture_header function inlibavcodec/mpeg4videodec.c may trigger a NULL pointer dereference whileconverting a crafted AVI file to MPEG4, leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mythtv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
